register.title: Register
register.description: If you are interested in participating, please send an e-mail with the names and student IDâ€™s of each member of the team and the team name to albert.sanchez@cetys.mx

register.title: Rules
register.description: Teams must be composed of six members. All participants must be students of CETYS University and must follow the organizers instructions. Physical or verbal violence will result in automatic disqualification.

register.title: Help
register.description: For any questions please contact albert.sanchez@cetys.mx

register.title: Credits
register.description: This app was made by students of CETYS University using amazing technologies like Ionic, Proximi.io and Firebase
